entry.title: WIND WARNING , Bella Bella
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Bella Airport 8:43 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: S 17 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except 90 gusting to 110 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
